name: market for sodium tetrahydridoborate | sodium tetrahydridoborate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3313/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'sodium tetrahydridoborate', in the Global geography.;No transport by ship. The other distances reduced by 70% from the default transport model since the product is usually produced and used on the same location.;'sodium tetrahydridoborate'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 016940-66-2. It is called 'sodium tetrahydroborate' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: BH4.Na. It is solid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure and is odourless. The substance is modelled as a pure substance.  There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: paper chemicals and dyes, pharmaceuticals and metal surface treatment products. This substance is used for the synthesis of other substances (use as intermediate).

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'sodium tetrahydridoborate',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'sodium tetrahydridoborate',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
